divs: Sighting DetailsSitting out 10pm ish. Saw golden & red orb. Too low to be an aircraft, too high to have come from the ground. Six of these orbs, spaced about 3 minutes apart, travled the EXACT same route. It was very very precise in it's movement. I have also seen them two other times in the late evening since the first sighting, including last night. Driving with a friend, and we were actually talking about them because her GRANDKIDS also saw them last week and took pictures. As we were talking I saw one in the sky. We pulled off the road and watched in wonderment as a total of 5, again precisely spaced apart, traveled in a northbound direction and then eventually disappeared from sight. We had also seen a single one earlier in the evening while at fireworks. Solid light, not blinking. I knew it was something I have NEVER seen before, and assumed it to be UFO in origin.
Summary: Multiple, identical red & gold orbs traveling in a straight line
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Garden City
There were no other sightings in Garden City on or around June 20th 2013
